name: YATK staging
description:
This is a canary build.

Next iteration of our game jam version (https://deadwookie.itch.io/yatk)

  • You need to stop THE VIRUS, while you still have free cells:
    • It spreads CONTINUOUSLY  from cell to cell;
    • It starts with a random SEQUENCE;
    • Each TURN It just duplicates current strain.
  • You can neutralize TWO infected cells by these RULES:
    1. They both should be on the same VERTICAL, HORIZONTAL or DIAGONAL,
    2. They both should be VISIBLE to each other,
    3. They both should have the SAME VALUE or make a SUM OF 10.
  • There are also limited powers to EXCHANGE two cells or MOVE one into next free spot
